cardano/transaction/OutputReference.title: OutputReference
cardano/transaction/OutputReference.description:
An `OutputReference` is a unique reference to an output on-chain. The `output_index`
 corresponds to the position in the output list of the transaction (identified by its id)
 that produced that output

fields.title: owner_stake_pkh
fields.description: The optional (?) stake address of the sender mingled address

fields.title: start_time
fields.description: Starting Date Time. Namely time of the first payment should be made

fields.title: end_time
fields.description: If specified, no more payments must be made after end date. This can be used to determine how many payments to make (start_time + (N + 1) * payment_frequency)

fields.title: payment_interval_hours
fields.description: How often to perform a payment

fields.title: max_payment_delay_hours
fields.description: Maximum delay to perform payment within a period. Expressed in hours.

fields.title: max_fees_lovelace
fields.description: max fee customer is willing to pay
